titleStmt.title: The bride a comedie. Acted in the yeere 1638. at the private house in Drury-lane by their Majesties Servants. The author, Thomas Nabbes.
titleStmt.author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[ichard] H[odgkinson] for Laurence Blaikelocke and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Sugar-loafe next Temple barre in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the New York Public Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Sugar-loafe next Temple barre in Fleet-street
